description: As a tester i want to validate the account page to ensure it displays correctly
name: Ensure that the accounts page is rendered correctly after login

elements.name: On selected environment i ensure that the accounts page is rendered correctly

steps.name: I navigate to the "login" page on the selected environment
The account page should show the user email and have header "Welcome back"

result.error_message:
AssertionError: Timed out retrying after 40000ms: Expected to find content: 'Welcome back' within the element: <h2.chakra-heading.css-1jb3vzl> but never did.
    at Object.loginHeader (cypress/pom/Loginpage.js:8:44)
    at Context.eval (cypress/integration/Login.js:57:7)
    at Context.resolveAndRunStepDefinition (node_modules/cypress-cucumber-preprocessor/lib/resolveStepDefinition.js:193:0)
    at Context.eval (node_modules/cypress-cucumber-preprocessor/lib/createTestFromScenario.js:27:0)

steps.name: I ensure that all nav links are complete and visible with each having an Icon
I should see that the Account Area has 6 tabs present
For tab "1" The "Number of Upcoming Bookings:" count when "0" , "No Active Orders" should be seen in the list below else count should match items displayed
For tab "2" The "Number of Passes:" count when "0" , "No Passes" should be seen in the list below else count should match items displayed
For tab "3" The "Number of Past Orders:" count when "0" , "No Past Orders" should be seen in the list below else count should match items displayed
For tab "4" The "Number of Memberships:" count when "0" , "No Memberships" should be seen in the list below else count should match items displayed
For tab "5" The "Number of Patronages:" count when "0" , "No Patronages" should be seen in the list below else count should match items displayed
For tab "6" The "Number of Vouchers:" count when "0" , "No Vouchers" should be seen in the list below else count should match items displayed
